Title: Mukashibanashi Dokkiri Anime
Description: ["CoroCoro Comic's ", Yarisugi!!! Itazura-kun, ", in honor of it's 3rd manga volume going on sale, received web shorts on CoroCoro Comic's official YouTube channel. Itazura-kun loves pranks and thinks about them 24/7. These web shorts are Itazura-kun's re-imagining of classic folktales such as Cinderella and Momotarou."]
